serbian.environmentally-friendly-text: Električni automobili proizvode nulte emisije, što značajno smanjuje zagađenje vazduha i pomaže u borbi protiv klimatskih promena.
serbian.cost-effective-text: Električna vozila imaju niže troškove održavanja u poređenju sa tradicionalnim vozilima na benzin, što vam štedi novac na gorivu i održavanju.
serbian.footer-text: © 2024 Održiva energija Državni univerzitet u Novom Pazaru projekat. Sva prava zadržana.
serbian.about-us-text: Istražite najnovije informacije o električnim vozilima i punionicama širom Srbije.
serbian.about-us-image-text: Mi smo strastveni tim posvećen unapređenju korišćenja električnih vozila širom Srbije. Sa snažnim uverenjem u budućnost čiste energije, naš cilj je da električna mobilnost postane dostupna pojedincima i preduzećima. Naša misija nije samo promocija upotrebe električnih automobila, već i podsticanje održivog načina života i odgovorne potrošnje energije. Pružanjem informacija, resursa i rešenja za punjenje, trudimo se da utrtemo put ka zelenijem, efikasnijem i ekološki svesnijem društvu. Pridružite nam se na putu ka održivoj budućnosti.
serbian.env-friendly-text: Električni automobili ne proizvode emisije, pomažući u smanjenju zagađenja vazduha i borbi protiv klimatskih promena.
serbian.quiet-efficient-text: Električni automobili rade tiho i nude odličnu energetsku efikasnost, što dovodi do glađeg i udobnijeg vozačkog iskustva.
serbian.contact-us-banner-text: Ako imate bilo kakva pitanja ili vam je potrebna pomoć, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. Tu smo da vam pomognemo!
serbian.name: Ime
serbian.success: Hvala! Vaš obrazac je uspešno poslat.
serbian.success-text: Kontaktiraćemo Vas što je pre moguće.
serbian.station-banner-text: Istražite najbliže stanice za punjenje električnih vozila
serbian.save-energy-text: Da li ste znali da jednostavno gašenje nepotrebnih svetala može uštedeti do 20% na vašem računu za struju? Male akcije mogu imati veliki uticaj na vaš novčanik i životnu sredinu.
serbian.faq-question-four: Koliko daleko može putovati električni automobil sa punom baterijom?
serbian.faq-answer-four: Domet električnog automobila zavisi od kapaciteta baterije i modela, ali većina može preći između 200 do 400 kilometara sa punom baterijom.
serbian.faq-question-five: Da li su električni automobili bezbedni?
serbian.faq-answer-five: Da, električni automobili su dizajnirani sa bezbednošću na umu i podvrgavaju se rigoroznim testiranjima, baš kao i tradicionalna vozila.
serbian.faq-answer-six: Električni automobili obično imaju niže troškove održavanja u poređenju sa automobilima na benzin jer imaju manje pokretnih delova i ne zahtevaju promenu ulja.
serbian.faq-question-seven: Mogu li napuniti električni automobil kod kuće?
serbian.faq-answer-seven: Da, većina električnih automobila može se puniti kod kuće pomoću standardne električne utičnice ili snažnije kućne stanice za punjenje.
serbian.electric-hero-text: Naučite nešto novo o električnim vozilima
serbian.card-text-price: Električni automobili obično se kreću u cenovnom rasponu od 30.000 do 70.000 dolara, u zavisnosti od modela i karakteristika.
serbian.card-text-charging-cost: Prosečan trošak punjenja električnog automobila kod kuće kreće se od 30 do 60 dolara mesečno, u zavisnosti od potrošnje i lokalnih tarifa za struju.

english.environmentally-friendly-text: Electric cars produce zero emissions, which significantly reduces air pollution and helps combat climate change.
english.cost-effective-text: Electric vehicles have lower running costs compared to traditional gasoline vehicles, saving you money on fuel and maintenance.
english.footer-text: © 2024 Sustainable Energy The State University in Novi Pazar Project. All Rights Reserved.
english.about-us-text: Explore the latest information about electric vehicles and charging stations across Serbia.
english.about-us-image-text: We are a passionate team committed to advancing the adoption of electric vehicles throughout Serbia. With a strong belief in the future of clean energy, we aim to make electric mobility accessible to individuals and businesses alike. Our mission is not only to promote the use of electric cars but also to encourage sustainable living and responsible energy consumption. By providing information, resources, and charging solutions, we strive to pave the way for a greener, more efficient, and environmentally conscious society. Join us in driving towards a sustainable future.
english.env-friendly-text: Electric cars produce no emissions, significantly reducing air pollution and playing a crucial role in combating climate change.
english.quiet-efficient-text: Electric cars operate silently and offer excellent energy efficiency, leading to a smoother and more comfortable driving experience.
english.contact-us-banner-text: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us. We're here to help!
english.name: Name
english.success: Thank you! Your form has been submitted.
english.success-text: We’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
english.station-banner-text: Explore the nearest electric vehicle charging stations
english.save-energy-text: Did you know that simply turning off unused lights can save up to 20% on your electricity bill? Small actions can make a big impact on both your wallet and the environment.
english.faq-question-four: How far can an electric car travel on a full charge?
english.faq-answer-four: The range of an electric car depends on the battery capacity and model, but most can travel between 200 to 400 kilometers on a full charge.
english.faq-answer-five: Yes, electric cars are designed with safety in mind and undergo rigorous testing, just like traditional vehicles.
english.faq-question-six: What is the cost of maintaining an electric car?
english.faq-answer-six: Electric cars typically have lower maintenance costs compared to gasoline cars because they have fewer moving parts and do not require oil changes.
english.faq-question-seven: Can I charge an electric car at home?
english.faq-answer-seven: Yes, most electric cars can be charged at home using a standard electrical outlet or a more powerful home charging station.
english.electric-hero-text: Learn some intersting facts about electric cars
english.card-text-price: Electric cars typically range in price from $30,000 to $70,000, depending on the model and features.
english.card-text-charging-cost: The average cost of charging an electric car at home ranges from $30 to $60 per month, depending on usage and local electricity rates.
